channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: In Las Vegas, an upset inmate damages the door on a patrol car; in Portland, Ore., a man overestimates the legal consequences of his actions; in Tacoma, Wash., a couple charged with domestic violence denies getting physical.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: Deputies assist arresting officers by removing an angry man from their patrol car; violent outbursts plague an arrest; one woman struggles with bail; three drunk men become wildly emotional.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Police Pursuits by Law&Crime
channel.desc: A man on the run smashes through windows to escape.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Police Pursuits by Law&Crime
channel.desc: A man dives from a speeding car to escape police.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: A man is arrested at a popular theme park for public intoxication; a detainee swallows his earring during processing; officers attempt to restrain a combative woman in custody.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: In Charlotte, N.C., an angry inmate refuses to change clothes; in Portland, Ore., a young man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike; in Las Vegas, two men arrested for domestic violence claim they were beaten.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: An angry man refuses to cooperate during the booking process; a man claims to be part of the "international police.".

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: An extremely agitated woman gets placed in a restraint chair; a young woman with a drug addiction is booked on prostitution charges; an uncooperative and drunken man refuses to change into his jail uniform.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: After being arrested for domestic violence, a man is placed in restraints; an intoxicated man picks a fight with inmates over their hometown; a woman is arrested for assaulting theater guards.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: Officers have difficulty booking an incomprehensible man; a commotion at a church ends in arrest; a man wearing a tuxedo is detained after mocking officers for wearing pig suits.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: A woman lies hobbled in the backseat of a patrol car after kicking the officer in the face; officers struggle to control an outrageous man; they attend to a woman struck by a drunk driver.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell; a woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers; a young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Sidebar
channel.desc: A daily recap podcast that highlights the top moments from the biggest trials of the day.

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Cops Reloaded
channel.desc: "Cops" has been producing new episodes for more than 20 years, and with daily repeats of the iconic series entering their second decade on the air, producers felt it was time for a change to freshen things up, which is how the idea for "Cops Reloaded" was born. This entry in the long-running franchise takes footage from previous episodes and re-edits it to produce new episodes. Some of the program's wildest criminals, most memorable car chases, and craziest moments are featured on "Reloaded.".

channel.name: Law & Crime US
channel.title: Jail
channel.desc: Jail gives viewers a front row seat as recently arrested suspects face entry into the criminal justice system.
